de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.senv.core

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.senv.core.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a physical location in the infrastructure graph.
    Author:
    Mario Hegele, Illya Stepanov

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String x,
              java.lang.String y)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new vertex.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier
        name - name of the represented location
        x - the x coordinate, should be of type double
        y - the y coordinate, should be of type double
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception is thrown if the values of the parameters which are handed over are not legal

    • Method Detail

        public java.lang.String getID()

        public double getY()
        Returns:
        returns the y coordinate of this vertex

      • getInternalID

        public int getInternalID()
        The internal ID indicates the position of the vertex in the vertex vector, if set properly. It ranges from 0 to size-1.
        Returns:
        returns the internally used ID

      • setInternalID

        public void setInternalID(int id)
        Sets the internally used ID
        Parameters:
        id - the internal ID

      • getNeighbours

        public java.util.ArrayList getNeighbours()
        Returns:
        returns a list of all direct neighboring vertices

      • addNeighbour

        public void addNeighbour(Vertex v)
        Adds a neighbour of this vertex (i.e. there exists an edge which connects this vertex with another vertex) If the neighbour vertex is already a neighbour vertex, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        v - the neighbour

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether this vertex is equal to some other vertex.

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - vertex to compare with
        Returns:
        true, if the vertices have the same ID
